title: My Goole Pixel 2xl is shutting down anytime I plug something into the usbc port.
content: I have tried starting in safe mode.  That didn't work.  I have factory reset the phone.  It still does not work.  It doesn't matter if I plug in a charger or headphones, it still shuts down.  The charger that came with the phone doesn't work.  Neither do other chargers.
